title: Hour 1: Deadline Headlines
description:
In this episode, Jeff Saturday, Keyshawn Johnson, and RGIII hold it down for Stephen A. as they react to the Bengals double-digit loss to the Browns last night and debate if Cincinnati is in danger of missing the playoffs. Plus, with the trade deadline tonight, Adam Schefter is here to debate what last-minute moves should be made by the Packers and Cowboys. Brian Windhorst and Bomani Jones join the show with their takes on the newest Kyrie Irving situation in Brooklyn.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Do the Packers need to trade for a WR before the trade deadline?
